channel.title: Three question
channel.description:
yeah titel say alot sould we begain? 1. how can i make my own quest? can you link a tutorial?
2. is that possibel to make my own spell book? and of how can i do it?
3. how can i make an normal cooking event you know you use some food on the range and then you will cook it?
thats all form Nicki :D

item.title: Three question
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

  1. i’ve trying to use the search buttom but since alot of the server have questes now then all the servers come up so that is kinda hard to find it

  2. then how do i change the spell book? or can i add some new magics?

Read full topic

item.title: Three question
item.dc:creator: @samtherule samtherule
item.description:
@samtherule wrote:

yeah titel say alot sould we begain? 1. how can i make my own quest? can you link a tutorial?

  1. is that possibel to make my own spell book?
    and of how can i do it?

  2. how can i make an normal cooking event you know you use some food on the range and then you will cook it?

thats all
form Nicki

  1. Use the search button in the top…

  2. I really don’t think you can make your own skill book… But you can change the models in the book.

  3. Most servers have cooking and to make an event with it maybe a little complicated.

Read full topic
